name: asana-mcp-server
description: Comprehensive Model Context Protocol server for Asana project management integration
long_description: A comprehensive Model Context Protocol server that provides read and write access to Asana workspaces, projects, and tasks. This server enables LLMs to manage projects, create and update tasks, track progress, and collaborate effectively within Asana. Features 22 tools covering workspace exploration, project management, task operations, status updates, and team collaboration. Perfect for AI-powered project management and workflow automation.

tools.name: asana_search_projects
tools.description: Search projects with name pattern matching

tools.name: asana_get_project_task_counts
tools.description: Get number of tasks in a project

tools.name: asana_search_tasks
tools.description: Advanced task searching with multiple filters

tools.name: asana_create_subtask
tools.description: Add a subtask to an existing task

tools.name: asana_create_task_story
tools.description: Add a comment to a task

tools.name: asana_get_tasks_for_tag
tools.description: Retrieve tasks associated with a tag

access_token.title: Asana Access Token
access_token.description: Your Asana Personal Access Token. Create one at https://app.asana.com/0/my-apps with appropriate permissions for your workspace.

read_only.title: Read Only Mode
read_only.description: Run the server in read-only mode to prevent any modifications to your Asana data.
